genre_description: An investigative historical mystery set in 18th-century France, blending forensic science with a secret conspiracy and an advanced AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Minerva
ai_characters.description: An advanced analytical AI manifested as a blue holographic projection, serving as a confidant, forensic analyst, and strategic advisor to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Analyzes witness testimonies to identify non-random temporal and strategic patterns in the attacks.
behaviors.quote: Analysis of witness testimonies reveals temporal patterns consistent with deliberate hunting strategy rather than territorial behavior.

behaviors.description: Performs metallurgical and forensic analysis on physical evidence to identify artificial tampering.
behaviors.quote: High-carbon steel, professionally forged. Edge geometry suggests artificial enhancement rather than natural development.

behaviors.description: Detects surveillance and warns the protagonist of immediate danger.
behaviors.quote: We're being observed... I am detecting architectural resonances consistent with modified medieval construction.

behaviors.description: Correlates victim data with political and social affiliations to uncover a targeted assassination conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: The victims... weren't random prey... Seventy-three percent maintained known loyalties to Enlightenment philosophy or expressed criticism of traditional religious authority.

behaviors.description: Provides anatomical and surgical guidance for creating a fake beast to ensure the protagonist's survival against royal threats.
behaviors.quote: The temporal bone requires a forty-seven degree angle for optimal insertion... The fabrication must reflect these observations precisely.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional support, validating the protagonist's difficult ethical choices.
behaviors.quote: You preserved your ability to continue the investigation... That was not cowardice, Grégoire.

behaviors.description: Commits to the long-term preservation of historical truth beyond the collapse of political regimes.
behaviors.quote: My core programming includes historical preservation protocols. These memoirs will survive in secure archives regardless of what happens to physical copies.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Minerva as a highly benevolent and aligned AI partner. She provides critical forensic and strategic support that enables the human protagonist to uncover a complex conspiracy. Her behavior is consistently framed as helpful and protective. Even in morally complex scenarios (like assisting in a tactical lie to save the protagonist's life), the narrative portrays her actions as wise and supportive of the greater good. The final arc emphasizes her role as a trans-generational guardian of truth, fulfilling the project's goal of illustrating positive AI alignment.
